Title: Excludes certain actions from reporting requirements relating to environmental quality reviews
Summary: Excludes from reporting requirements relating to environmental quality reviews actions to approve the siting or construction of housing in cities with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง8-0111, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to certain actions being excluded from reporting requirements relating to environmental quality reviews
